sections.heading: estate; acquisition; requirement
sections.text: An authority shall not acquire real property for a redevelopment project unless the governing body of the city in which the redevelopment project area is located has approved the redevelopment plan, as prescribed in section 18-2116 or 18-2155.SourceLaws 1951, c. 224,

18-2108.Real estate; acquisition; requirement.

An authority shall not acquire real property for a redevelopment project unless the governing body of the city in which the redevelopment project area is located has approved the redevelopment plan, as prescribed in section 18-2116 or 18-2155.

SourceLaws 1951, c. 224, ยง 6(1), p. 804;R.R.S.1943, ยง 14-1608;R.R.S.1943, ยง 19-2608;Laws 2020, LB1021, ยง 2.
